# [Interview #1159: Shadows of Self-Brookline, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1159#15)

#### Question

Does double copper give you perfect memory?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Good question. I haven't answered that one yet.
